p:
Glutathione peroxidase (GPx, EC 1.11.1.9) activity was assayed by monitoring the oxidation rate of nicotinamide adenine dinucleotide phosphate (NADPH) at 340 nm by the coupled reaction with glutathione reductase (GR)
21
,
22 . The reaction tube contained 1 M Tris-HCl, 5 mM EDTA buffer (pH 8.0), 0.1 M GSH, 10 U mL −1 GR, 2 mM NADPH, 7 mM t-butylhydroperoxide, distillated water and tissue homogenate (10 µL).
